appDesc: Apply for financial aid with confidence. Our accessible, step-by-step application helps you describe your situation with optional AI assistance.
step1Desc: Provide your personal details including ID, contact, and location. All fields are validated.
step2Desc: Tell us about your employment, income, housing, and dependents to assess your eligibility.
step3Desc: Use our AI-powered assistant to help you describe your current challenges in clear language.

otp.title: Enter OTP
otp.sentTo: OTP sent to mobile ending in {{masked}}
otp.notVerified: Please verify your National ID via OTP

step3.reasonPlaceholder: Why are you applying for this support?

prompts.financial: My name is {{name}}. I live in {{city}}, {{country}}, and I am currently {{maritalStatus}} with {{dependents}} dependents. I earn approximately {{income}} per month, and my current housing status is {{housing}}. Please write a first-person paragraph describing my current financial situation, including any hardship I might be facing in covering basic expenses or managing my obligations.
prompts.employment: My name is {{name}}. I am currently {{employmentStatus}} and earn around {{income}} per month. Please write a short paragraph in the first person explaining my current employment situation, including any difficulties I'm facing such as irregular work, recent job loss, or job insecurity.
prompts.reason: My name is {{name}}, and I live in {{country}}. I am {{maritalStatus}} with {{dependents}} dependents, and my housing status is {{housing}}. Please write a sincere, first-person paragraph explaining why I am applying for financial assistance, based on my personal and living situation.
